item.title: These US cities could see surge in pests this spring
item.description: Deviations from normal weather patterns are putting several regions in the U.S. at risk for an uptick of disease-spreading pests, a pest-management gr...

item.title: Federal judge rules Trump administration could have to pay nearly $2 billion
item.description: Judge Amir Ali said the Trump administration violated a court order about foreign aid and is ordering them to pay millions to nonprofits.

item.title: Trump to hold 1st Cabinet meeting. Elon Musk will be there, too
item.description: President Donald Trump is holding the first Cabinet meeting of his second term on Wednesday. In attendance will be Elon Musk.
